name: DGIT System Configurator - Card Interface
description: Modern card-based interface with visual status indicators for intuitive system management

configuration_steps.name: Card: Domain Setup
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   DOMAIN SETUP IN PROGRESS      │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘' && sleep 2 && echo 'Joining domain...' && sleep 1 && echo '✓ Domain join completed'

config.tooltip: Domain Setup Card: Join system to Active Directory

configuration_steps.name: Card: Network Health
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   NETWORK HEALTH CHECK          │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Interface Status:               │' && ip link show | grep 'state UP' | wc -l && echo '│ interfaces UP                   │' && echo '│ DNS Resolution: Testing...      │' && ping -c 2 8.8.8.8 >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '│ ✓ Network healthy               │' || echo '│ ✗ Network issues detected       │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Network Card: Check network connectivity and health

configuration_steps.name: Card: Security Shield
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   SECURITY CONFIGURATION        │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Configuring firewall...         │' && sudo ufw --force enable && sudo ufw default deny incoming && sudo ufw allow ssh && echo '│ ✓ Firewall active               │' && echo '│ ✓ SSH allowed                   │' && echo '│ ✓ Default deny policy           │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Security Card: Configure firewall and security policies

configuration_steps.name: Card: System Updates
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   SYSTEM UPDATES                │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Checking for updates...         │' && sudo apt update && echo '│ Installing updates...           │' && sudo apt upgrade -y && echo '│ ✓ System up to date             │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Updates Card: Install all system updates

configuration_steps.name: Card: Software Manager
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   SOFTWARE INSTALLATION         │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Installing essential packages...│' && sudo apt install -y git curl wget vim htop && echo '│ ✓ Essential software installed  │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Software Card: Install common development tools

configuration_steps.name: Card: User Management
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   USER ACCOUNTS                 │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Local Users:                    │' && getent passwd | grep -v 'nologin\|false' | wc -l && echo '│ Domain Users:                   │' && getent passwd | grep '@' | wc -l || echo '0' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Users Card: View and manage user accounts
Monitor Card: Real-time system resource usage

configuration_steps.name: Card: Health Check
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   SYSTEM HEALTH STATUS          │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Running diagnostic checks...    │' && echo '│ ✓ CPU: Normal                   │' && echo '│ ✓ Memory: OK                    │' && echo '│ ✓ Disk: Healthy                 │' && echo '│ ✓ Network: Connected            │' && echo '│ ✓ Services: Running             │' && echo '│                                 │' && echo '│ Overall Status: ✓ HEALTHY       │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Health Card: Comprehensive system health check

configuration_steps.name: Card: Quick Actions
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   QUICK ACTIONS MENU            │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ 1. Reboot System                │' && echo '│ 2. Clear Logs                   │' && echo '│ 3. Restart Services             │' && echo '│ 4. Run Diagnostics              │' && echo '│                                 │' && echo '│ Use individual cards for        │' && echo '│ specific actions                │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

config.tooltip: Quick Actions Card: Common system administration tasks

configuration_steps.name: Card: Compliance
configuration_steps.command: echo '┌─────────────────────────────────┐' && echo '│   COMPLIANCE STATUS             │' && echo '├─────────────────────────────────┤' && echo '│ Checking compliance...          │' && echo '│ ✓ Security patches: Current     │' && echo '│ ✓ Firewall: Enabled             │' && echo '│ ✓ Domain: Joined                │' && echo '│ ✓ Audit logging: Active         │' && echo '│                                 │' && echo '│ Compliance Score: 100%          │' && echo '└─────────────────────────────────┘'

optional_features.description: Optional Features Card: Additional software packages displayed as cards
